first_para: James Francis Murphy (born 23 August 1967) is a Scottish Labour Party politician who is currently the Leader of the Scottish Labour Party and Member of Parliament (MP) for East Renfrewshire.

full.extract:
James Francis Murphy (born 23 August 1967) is a Scottish Labour Party politician who is currently the Leader of the Scottish Labour Party and Member of Parliament (MP) for East Renfrewshire.
He previously served as Parliamentary Secretary at the Cabinet Office from 2005 to 2006, Minister of State for Employment and Welfare Reform from 2006 to 2007, the Minister of State for Europe from 2007-08, and the Secretary of State for Scotland in the Cabinet from 2008-10.
full.title: Jim Murphy
